title: Past Lives - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/12/20
itunes:title: Past Lives - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/12/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett listens to an open lines caller recount the story of his mother, who believed she was a British soldier killed during World War 1.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
